message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a premium price given its value. I can meet you halfway, but I'm thinking of $160
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $155
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think the product is worth more than that. I can do $152, but that's as low as I'm willing to go
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $152 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $142 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I've already said I'm willing to go as low as $152, and you're asking me to go even lower. I'm not willing to do that. I'm willing to meet you halfway from the last offer, so I'll do $149
I understand we're close to the end of our negotiation, but I'm still not comfortable with $149. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. This is my final offer.
